```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
m1 = lm(price ~ carat, data = diamonds)
m2 = lm(price ~ carat + cut, data = diamonds)
```

```{r}
combine_model = function(...) {
  model_list = list(...)
  
  lapply(model_list, function(lm_object) lm_object$coefficients)
}
```

```{r}
# Sample list of data frames
df1 <- data.frame(ID = c(1, 2, 3), Value = c(10, 20, 30))
df2 <- data.frame(ID = c(4, 5, 6), Value = c(40, 50, 60))
df3 <- data.frame(ID = c(7, 8, 9), Value = c(70, 80, 90))

df_list <- list(df1, df2, df3)

# Apply bind_rows() to the list
combined_df <- reduce(df_list, bind_rows)
combined_df
```
